Name: Stela of Nofer
Description: The scenes on this small stela are executed in raised relief, the hieroglyphs, however, are incised. The lunette shows two udjat-eyes flanking a shen-ring.Below them, a couple are depicted seated on a chair. Facing them is a man with a shaven head. There are captions next to the figures. The lower register contains the offering formula in five columns of hieroglyphs.
